title: Search Blog 2015 - Nirvana Naturopathy & Retreat
author: Nirvana Naturopathy; Retreat Center
cleaned_text: With each passing day, no matter how technologically advanced we become, we cannot really stall the growth of diseases besides making tension our best friend.
